html:
{{t:cta_headline}}

{{t:cta_subheadline}}

{{t:cta_button_primary}}
css: .section-cta-image-left-text-right-wz { padding: 80px 0; background-color: var(--color-surface-1); }.section-cta-image-left-text-right-wz .container { }.section-cta-image-left-text-right-wz .cta-grid { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; gap: 40px; align-items: center; }.section-cta-image-left-text-right-wz .cta-image-wrapper img { width: 100%; height: auto; border-radius: 8px; display: block; }.section-cta-minimalist-card-9f .cta-card-text { font-size: 1rem; color: var(--color-secondary); margin-bottom: 30px; line-height: 1.6; }.section-cta-image-left-text-right-wz .cta-text-content { }.section-cta-image-left-text-right-wz .cta-title { font-size: clamp(2rem, 5vw, 3rem); font-family: var(--font-heading); margin-bottom: 20px; color: var(--color-dark); }.section-cta-image-left-text-right-wz .cta-description { font-size: 1.1rem; color: var(--color-secondary); margin-bottom: 30px; line-height: 1.6; }.section-cta-image-left-text-right-wz .cta-button { display: inline-block; padding: 15px 30px; background-color: var(--color-primary); color: var(--color-light); text-decoration: none; border-radius: 50px; font-weight: bold; transition: all 0.3s ease; border: 2px solid var(--color-primary); }.section-cta-image-left-text-right-wz .cta-button:hover { background-color: transparent; color: var(--color-primary); }.section-cta-image-left-text-right-wz .cta-actions { margin-top: 30px; }.section-cta-image-left-text-right-wz .container { padding: 0 20px; }@media (max-width: 768px) {.section-cta-image-left-text-right-wz .cta-grid { grid-template-columns: 1fr; text-align: center; } .section-cta-image-left-text-right-wz .cta-actions { justify-content: center; }}

en.cta_subheadline: Join our community of creators and build something amazing together.

ar.cta_subheadline: انضم إلى مجتمع المبدعين لدينا وابنوا شيئًا مذهلاً معًا.

de.cta_subheadline: Treten Sie unserer Community von Kreativen bei und bauen Sie gemeinsam etwas Erstaunliches.
